item.title: Roblox: Pet Tower Defense Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
10kfavorites When playing Pet Tower Defense , you have to clear stages from waves of enemies using various units. But instead of towers, players can deploy cute pets. Each of them has different stats and attacks, so you will want to summon as many units as possible to create different teams. And this is where Pet Tower Defense codes come in.

As expected from Roblox codes, they contain various rewards, including Coins for summoning new pets. However, you should not delay using them, as each code expires after a while.

Updated August 7, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A new wave of codes has arrived in Pet Tower Defense , bringing even more free rewards to claim. These bonuses can offer a helpful boost depending on where you are in the game. If you’ve already redeemed the older one, now’s a good time to pick up the latest additions. More updates may roll out with fresh rewards, so it’s worth checking back regularly.

All Pet Tower Defense Codes

Working Pet Tower Defense Codes

  • 10kfavorites - Redeem this code to get free rewards (NEW)
  • 50kmembers - Redeem this code to get free rewards (NEW)
  • update3 - Redeem this code to get free rewards (NEW)
  • gullible - Redeem this code to get free rewards (NEW)
  • demon - Redeem this code to get free rewards (NEW)
  • update2 - Redeem this code to get free rewards (NEW)
  • 2million - Redeem this code to get free rewards (NEW)
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get free rewards

Expired Pet Tower Defense Codes

There are no expired codes in Pet Tower Defense . We will update this article as soon as more code becomes available.

Clearing stages in Pet Tower Defense is not much different from most other TD experiences. You just need to place strong enough pets on the map and destroy all enemies. However, if in the early stages even the starting units will be enough for you, then in the mid-game you will have to use stronger pets. All because you will start to meet stronger and faster enemies. Therefore, your main goal is to earn Coins. Usually, they can be obtained for clearing stages and daily login. But there is a faster way, namely, Pet Tower Defense codes.

You only need a few codes to earn extra Coins and summon new units. But it is worth noting that they have a limited validity period, so you should hurry.

How to Redeem Pet Tower Defense Codes

Using Pet Tower Defense codes is not different from most other Roblox games. Players only need to make a few clicks after they fulfill one condition. You can redeem codes in Pet Tower Defense only after reaching level 10 or higher:

  • First, launch Pet Tower Defense .
  • Then, find the Codes area in the lobby and approach it.
  • If you have fulfilled the condition, you will gain access to the redemption window.
  • Enter the code to claim the well-deserved rewards.

How to Get More Pet Tower Defense Codes

To receive fresh Pet Tower Defense codes as soon as they are released, you should start following the developer pages. There you will find all the news, including upcoming events and giveaways:

  • Best Games TM Roblox group
  • Best Games TM X page
  • Best Games TM Discord server
Roblox

8.8 /10
Released
September 1, 2006

WHERE TO PLAY

item.title: Roblox: Ninja Legends Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Ninja Legends Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Ninja Legends
  • Ninja Legends Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Ninja Legends
  • About the Ninja Legends Developers

This article is perfect for Roblox players who are looking for a source of Ninja Legends codes. Almost all of them offer a valuable in-game currency: Chi. The developers generously reward Roblox players for redeeming codes in Ninja Legends allowing them to save a lot of time on farming.

Updated August 7, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are plenty of active codes available right now, offering a wide range of useful rewards like Chi, Gems, Souls, and auto-training boosts. These bonuses can help speed up your progress and give you more flexibility as you play. It’s a good idea to redeem them while they’re still working, as older codes can expire without notice. We’re always watching for the next round of rewards, so feel free to check back here whenever you want to see what’s new.

All Ninja Legends Codes

Hurry up and redeem all the codes in Ninja Legends . The developers add quite a few of them, but they also make old codes inactive.

Codes Checked on August 7, 2025.

Working Ninja Legends Codes

  • innerpeace5k - Enter this code to get 5000 Chi. (NEW)

Expired Ninja Legends Codes

  • goldninja500 - Enter this code to get 500 Chi.
  • Chisilentshadows1000 - Enter this code to get 1000 Chi.
  • Chiskyblades10K - Enter this code to get 10k Chi.
  • Chiinnerpeace5k - Enter this code to get 5k Chi.
  • epictower350 - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • treeninja400 - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • shurikencity500 - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • epicturrets450 - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • powers500 - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • bossbattle300 - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • Firstplanet250 - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • epicturrets - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • waterfall500 - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • newgame500 - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • autotrain1 5 - Enter this code to get 15 Minutes of Auto-Training.
  • epicsensei500 - Enter this code to get 500 Chi.
  • launch100 - Enter this code to get 100 Coins.

How to Redeem Codes in Ninja Legends

Just like in many other Roblox games, redeeming codes in Ninja Legends is a simple task. Players can follow the instructions below to do so:

  • Open Roblox and launch Ninja Legends .
  • Find the blue “Codes” icon on the main screen of the game.
  • Click on this icon.
  • Enter the offered code in the field that says "Type Code Here."

Ninja Legends Tips and Tricks

Below are some valuable tips and tricks for Ninja Legends :

  • Consider using an auto-clicker tool to automate clicking and progress in the game.
  • Optimize gameplay by positioning between the shop and the selling area to upgrade weapons and earn coins efficiently.
  • Level up pets by participating in activities such as King of the Hill, attacking bosses, and running through circles or hoops.
  • Search various chests scattered throughout the game to collect additional rewards.

The Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Ninja Legends

In addition to fighting, Ninja Legends players have to grind quite a bit to save up for new weapons and such. Suppose they have already gotten the best weapon and have developed their characters as much as possible. In that case, they may want to play other games that offer a similar experience. For those who find themselves in this position, these fantastic fighting games like Ninja Legends should help to scratch the itch:

  • Fireball Punching Simulator
  • Blox Fruits
  • Dragon Blox
  • A One Piece Game
  • Rogue Demon

About the Ninja Legends Developers

Scriptbloxian Studios is a very productive development team that has already released 5 cool games. Their group in Roblox has more than 20 million members.

item.title: 2026 Video Game Release Date Calendar
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Games in January 2026
  • Games in February 2026
  • Games in May 2026
  • Big TBA 2026 Games

Video game releases were hot and heavy in 2025, and while we still don't know much about the games coming out in 2026, we can expect even more juggernauts to release.

This 2026 video game release date calendar will stay updated over the year as new video games are revealed, whether through Summer Game Fest, The Game Awards, a Nintendo Direct, State of Play, or whatever else.

We're only adding games to this list that have confirmed release windows for 2026. For games that are vaporware at this point, like Beyond Good and Evil 2 , for example, will not be on the list until Ubisoft confirms a date or at least an expected release year.

Updated on August 7, 2025:

---

Content Warning is coming to PS5, Switch, and XSX/S in 2026.

Check out our Interactive 2026 Release Date Calendar here!

item.title: Terminull Brigade Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Terminull Brigade is a PVE co-op shooter with roguelike mechanics, making each match unique and exciting. You will encounter numerous enemies, loot, cool abilities, and unique items in the shop. Thanks to this, the game has enormous potential for selecting effective builds regardless of location or chosen character. It is worth reading each skill carefully to select those that best suit your play style and enhance your character's strengths, because at the end of the day, you will face a boss that will either be your final stop or bring you a pile of loot.

As in many other similar free-to-play shooters, there are many options for customizing your character, available both for free and for premium currency. Fortunately, it is not necessary to spend real money, as you can redeem the Terminull Brigade and receive free rewards.

All Terminull Brigade Codes

Working Terminull Brigade Codes

  • DISCORD10K - Redeem this code to get x1000 Terminull Coin.
  • ROGUETEERS - Redeem this code to get x3 Respawn Coin.
  • 730JUZHEN - Redeem this code to get x1 Wild Fire avatar and x300 Platinum Coin.

Expired Terminull Brigade Codes

There are no expired codes for Terminull Brigade yet. When one of the codes becomes inactive, we will update this section.

How to Redeem Codes in Terminull Brigade

Using codes in many games isn't as straightforward as it is in Roblox , but if you're an experienced player, you shouldn't have any problems with this. If you're new to Terminull Brigade , you'll just need to go through a short tutorial and find the appropriate button. If you need help, you can use our guide below, where we explain how to redeem codes in Terminull Brigade .

  • Launch Terminull Brigade .
  • In the lobby, look at the left side of the screen. You need to find and click on the Event button.
  • Next, select the Benefits option at the top of the screen.
  • Then go to the Redemption Code tab.
  • Paste the code from our list of working codes into the text field and click on the blue Exchange button.

Codes in Terminull Brigade can expire very quickly, and you will not be able to receive rewards. Redeem them as soon as possible while they are active.

How to Get More Terminull Brigade Codes

Sometimes it can be difficult to find information about codes for certain free-to-play games. We know that players need them, so we've created this guide to help. We update it regularly so that you can be among the first to use new working codes. You can also check the official Terminull Brigade developer websites listed below:

  • Terminull Brigade Discord server
  • Terminull Brigade X page
  • Terminull Brigade YouTube channel
  • Terminull Brigade Facebook page

Terminull Brigade is available on mobile devices.
